SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_ISSPECIALTITLE
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_ISSPECIALTITLE(@TITLEGUID uniqueidentifier) returns bit with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @RESULT bit = 0
SELECT @RESULT = 1 FROM dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES tp WHERE tp.TITLECODEID = @TITLEGUID AND (ISSPECIALTITLE = 1 or ISRELIGIOUSTITLE = 1)
IF @RESULT IS NULL SET @RESULT = 0
return @RESULT end
